TextBlock.Text: NESIA: Meditation log 134, setting up now, just need to put my writing staff somewhere... here will do. Okay, sitting down, closing my eyes, and... breathing...
NESIA: Ahh. I was skeptical at first, but this truly was a brilliant suggestion on Karenia's part. These meditation sessions are making everything that's occurred much more bearable.

NESIA: Though she does find my choice of location strange, I cannot help that it is the best for this exercise. I am convinced this stone has something to do with the Eye. Meditating atop it makes me feel closer to the Eye and, by extension, the rest of our clan.
NESIA: Ah, it's hardly been any time at all, and I can already feel my body ignoring the stifling heat of this planet.
NESIA: Wait, no, I am certain that it is noticeably cooler in this cave than it normally is. What's going on?
NESIA: Ah! I'm not in the cave anymore! It seems that I have somehow managed to find myself somewhere else entirely!

NESIA: Incredible... it's so green, in a way that I have never seen the <color=purple>Bramble</color>. Just what is this place? Did you bring me here, my wandering friend? Is this place... important somehow? I cannot help but feel that it is... significant.
NESIA: I must find a way out and tell the others, something tells me that this is a very crucial discovery.
